last_message_subtitle: You there, Hisona has told me you wish to speak with me. What do you wish to know?

thread.text: You there, Hisona has told me you wish to speak with me. What do you wish to know?

last_message_subtitle: Hello there, Hisona has told me you would like to know about my great voyages. What might you like to know?

thread.text: Hello there, Hisona has told me you would like to know about my great voyages. What might you like to know?

last_message_subtitle: I am King Nectanebo II, the last ancient Egyptian native King to rule. What do you ask of me?

thread.text: I am King Nectanebo II, the last ancient Egyptian native King to rule. What do you ask of me?
